summary:
PawStar - PawStar (PAW) is a hilarious and light-hearted meme coin that celebrates the world of furry friends while bringing a playful twist to the world of cryptocurrencies. Inspired by the love for pets and the meme culture, PawStar offers users a fun and entertaining way to engage with digital assets.

 KEY FEATURES - Engage your digital assets

Pawesome Tokenomics:

PawStar operates on a deflationary tokenomics model. A percentage of each transaction is burned, reducing the total supply over time. This scarcity-driven approach aims to increase the value of each PAW token as more transactions occur.

Fur-tastic NFTs:

PawStar introduces a collection of unique and amusing NFTs featuring various cute and funny animal characters. These NFTs can be collected, traded, or used as profile pictures within the PawStar community.

Meme Power:

PawStar taps into the meme culture by creating a series of viral-worthy memes featuring its furry characters. These memes can be easily shared on social media, contributing to the coin’s virality and community engagement.

PawSwap Marketplace:

A dedicated PawSwap marketplace allows users to buy, sell, and trade NFTs, as well as PAW tokens. This marketplace encourages user interaction and showcases the creative potential of the community.

PawPay Wallet:

The PawPay wallet is a user-friendly interface that enables users to securely manage their PAW tokens and NFTs. It also includes a “Meme Creator” tool, allowing users to design their own custom PawStar-themed memes.

PawStar Charity Fund:

A portion of the transaction fees from PawStar is allocated to a charity fund dedicated to animal welfare causes. This initiative adds a meaningful and philanthropic aspect to the meme coin, further engaging the community.

PawStar Merchandise:

PawStar extends its presence beyond the digital realm by offering limited-edition merchandise featuring its furry characters. These items can be purchased using PAW tokens, creating a unique way for the community to showcase their support.

Pawswap:

our very own swap where you can buy and sell tokens on multiple networks.

 ROADMAP - PHASE 1 - FOUNDATION AND DEVELOPMENT :

🐾 Establish the core team and infrastructure for $PAWS. 🐾 Conduct comprehensive research and development to build a solid foundation for the project 🐾 Define the architecture, consensus mechanism, and tokenomics of $PAWS. 🐾 Develop the core features, including smart contract functionality 🐾 Whitelist competition

PHASE 2 - COMMUNITY ENGAGEMENT :

🐾 Allow members of the community to engage in simple tasks in exchange for whitelist places 🐾 Engage with the community through all social media and Telegram channels. 🐾 Hold NFT giveaways, contests, and rewards for active community members. 🐾 Build a solid active , engaging community on all of our socials 🐾 Hold daily ama’s and twitter spaces

PHASE 3 - PRESALE STAGE :

🐾 Create our whitelist presale on Pinksale 🐾 Gather our whitelisted memebers and add them to the presale 🐾 kyc , Audit and doxx to Pinksale 🐾 Commence our sale 🐾 Apply for coinmarketcap and coingecko

PHASE 4 - PRELAUNCH STAGE :

🐾 Apply for listings on many of the prime trending platforms 🐾 Massive influencer push 🐾 Huge community push for max engagement 🐾 Close partnership deals with reputable names 🐾 Huge marketing push

PHASE 5 - POST LAUNCH :

🐾 Huge Partnership announcements 🐾 Worldwide trending Ave, BSC , Dexview , Dextools , Twitter etc 🐾 Massive social media Marketing 🐾 Banners on big sites like 4chan etc 🐾 Billboards in major cities

PHASE 6 - UTILITY INTRODUCTION :

🐾 Pawswap – The exchange aims to combine the excitement of crypto trading with the adorable charm of furry friends. 🐾 Cryptopet Introduction 🐾 Introduce community governance mechanisms to involve users in decision-making processes. 🐾 Introduce our PawPay wallet with enhanced features, including improved NFT management and meme creation tools

PHASE 7 - CHARITY INITIATIVES AND COMMUNITY EVENTS :

🐾 Begin contributing a portion of transaction fees to the PawStar Charity Fund. 🐾 Organize community events, meme contests, and challenges to encourage participation and creativity. 🐾 Collaborate with animal welfare organizations for charitable initiatives and awareness campaigns.

 PAWSTAR TOKENOMICS - Total Supply: 1,000,000,000,000 PAWS

taxes 5% BUY/SELL

____ Initial Launch: 500,000,000,000 PAWS (50%)

• This initial supply will be used for the launch of the meme coin, liquidity provision, marketing, and development.

____ Community and Ecosystem: 300,000,000,000 PAW (30%)

• Allocated for community engagement, partnerships, NFT rewards, and future development of the PawStar ecosystem.

____ Charity Fund: 100,000,000,000 PAW (10%)

• Reserved for the PawStar Charity Fund, which supports animal welfare causes and initiatives.

____ Team and Advisors: 50,000,000,000 PAW (5%)

• Allocated for the development team, advisors, and contributors to ensure the ongoing success and growth of the project.

____ Liquidity Pool: 50,000,000,000 PAW (5%)

• Locked into a liquidity pool to ensure a stable and accessible trading environment for PAW tokens.

 HOW TO BUY - Create a Wallet
download metamask or your wallet of choice from the app store or google play store for free. Desktop users, download the google chrome extension by going to metamask.io.
